articles.author: Umar Shakir
articles.title: From Apple’s first iMac G3 to the iMac with M1: a visual history - The Verge
articles.description: Steve Jobs introduced the iMac onstage in 1998, and it changed the all-in-one computer market forever. This visual history details the iMac G3, G4 Flat Panel, G5, Intel white, aluminum, slim, Pro, M1, and every size including 27 inches.
articles.content: Whats an all-in-one computer? It combines at least a monitor, CPU, storage, and speakers into a single package that tidies up your desk. Its not a form factor invented by Apple; rather, it was pionee… [+13225 chars]
